goalReached.title: Congratulations!
goalReached.message: You've reached today's hydration goal. Keep up the healthy habit!

home.settingsHint: Click settings to adjust daily goal

quickInput.title: Quick Record
quickInput.tip: Tip: A regular cup is about 250ml, a thermos about 350ml, a large bottle about 500ml

recordEditor.title: Edit Record
recordEditor.subtitle: Modify hydration record volume and time
recordEditor.tip: Tip: After editing, the bucket progress will automatically recalculate and update

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.subtitle: This action cannot be undone
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this {{volume}} record?

validation.dateLimit: Date cannot be more than one year ago
validation.futureTime: Time cannot be in the future

networkUnavailable.title: Network Issue
networkUnavailable.message: Unable to connect to the network. Your records will be stored locally and synced automatically when the network is restored.

networkTimeout.title: Connection Timeout
networkTimeout.message: Network response took too long. Please check your network connection.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.message: The server is temporarily unable to process your request. Please try again later.

apiError.title: Service Error
apiError.message: Service temporarily unavailable. Your data has been safely stored locally.

invalidVolume.title: Input Error
invalidVolume.message: Please enter a valid water volume (1-5000ml).

validationFailed.title: Validation Failed
validationFailed.message: The input data format is incorrect. Please check and re-enter.

storageFull.title: Storage Full
storageFull.message: Local storage is full. Please clear some old data or contact technical support.

storageError.title: Storage Error
storageError.message: Unable to save data locally. Please try again.

indexedDBError.title: Local Database Error
indexedDBError.message: There was a problem with the local database. You may need to refresh the page.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.message: Unable to sync your data. Will automatically retry when network is restored.

conflictResolution.title: Data Conflict
conflictResolution.message: Data conflict detected. The most recent record has been automatically selected.

retryExhausted.title: Retry Limit Reached
retryExhausted.message: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please check your network connection and try again manually.

unknownError.title: Unknown Error
unknownError.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact technical support.
